name: Dogfight (itch) (lcmacdon)
description:
Much like the console it was released for, the Emerson Arcadia 2001. Dogfight was a little-known video game released for the system by Emerson Radio in 1982, it was one of the few games that was not a clone or an arcade port.

Being the second time I've participated in this game jam,  I once again had fun making this game. Before anyone asks why I chose an obscure console from the second generation of video game consoles, it was because it had a cool name.

Controls:

Up/Down/Left/Right = Movement

Spacebar = Fire

1 and 2 = Gamemode 1 and Gamemode 2.
